alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Brantley; Camden; Charlton; Clinch; Echols; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 15 at 2:01PM EDT until June 15 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 305 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER DUVAL NASSAU IN NORTHERN FLORIDA COLUMBIA HAMILTON SUWANNEE IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA ATKINSON BRANTLEY CAMDEN CHARLTON CLINCH ECHOLS WARE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ARLINGTON, ATKINSON, AXSON, BELMONT, COLUMBIA, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, HICKOX, HILLIARD, HOBOKEN, HOMELAND, HOMERVILLE, HORTENSE, HOUSTON, JACKSONVILLE, JASPER, JENNINGS, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKE CITY, LIVE OAK, LULU, MACCLENNY, MCALPIN, NAHUNTA, NEEDHAM, NEEDMORE, NEWBURN, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, OLENO STATE PARK, OLUSTEE, ORTEGA, PEARSON, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RAYBON, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, ST. GEORGE, STATENVILLE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, SUWANNEE SPRINGS, WATERTOWN, WAYCROSS, WAYNESVILLE, WEST LAKE, WHITE SPRINGS, WILLACOOCHEE, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.

area.areaDesc: Atkinson; Brantley; Camden; Charlton; Clinch; Echols; Ware
